remarks: Swap subtrahend and minuend inside the numerator and denominator of a fraction.  Deduction form of ~ div2sub .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
div2subd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
div2subd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
div2subd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
div2subd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
div2subd.5 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= D ) $.
div2subd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) / ( C - D ) ) = ( ( B - A ) / ( D - C ) ) ) $.
